review_title: I work as a staff Nurse at the epilepsy society
job_title: Staff Nurse (Learning Disabilities) in Chalfont Saint Peter, England
pros:
The feeling of being part of a family.
Working in a home environment where residents enjoy living there.
Good support from management- my opinions and views are valued. 
I am also made to feel appreciated and if there is something significant happening in my personal life, it is understood.
The pay is good.
Staff benefits- great training given, great annual leave hours. 
Working in the country side where I can sit out to have my lunch is lovely.
cons:
The large use of agency staff, which are not always reliable.
The placing is in the country side which makes it more difficult for residents in wheelchairs to get out and access facilities as easily.
